author: xtqqczze
body: Remove suppression of PreSharp error 56500: Avoid swallowing errors by catching non-specific exceptions.

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body: `56500` is [PreSharp 56500](https://github.com/search?q=org%3Adotnet+PreSharp+56500&type=Code): Avoid swallowing errors by catching non-specific exceptions.

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body: `56523` is PreSharp [56523](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/search?q=56523): Call 'Marshal.GetLastWin32Error' or 'Marshal.GetHRForLastWin32Error' before any other interop call.

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body: `56506` is PreSharp [56506](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/search?q=56506): Parameter 'arg0' to this public method must be validated: A null-dereference can occur here.

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body: `56503` is PreSharp [56503](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/search?q=56503): Property get methods should not throw exceptions.

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body: `56515` is PREfast [56515](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/search?q=56515): converting to int32 and converting back into intptr.
